rooms.description: Open and spacious living area, designed to be the heart of the home with ample natural light. Vastu principles applied for family cohesion.
Integrated dining area adjacent to the living room, fostering family interaction. Designed with minimalistic Brutalist elements.
Efficient kitchen space with a compact yet functional design, ensuring smooth workflow. Includes modern fixtures and storage solutions.
Master bedroom with an integrated spacious balcony to promote relaxation and fresh air. Vastu-aligned entrance and placement.
Secondary bedroom with its own balcony, ensuring privacy and a connection to nature. Vastu-aligned positioning.
Third bedroom designed for flexible use or guest space, also with a balcony to maintain consistency in design. Vastu principles observed.
Functional bathroom area placed strategically for privacy and ease of access. Designed with cost-effective yet durable fixtures.

openings.description: Main entrance aligned according to Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow. Secure and welcoming.
Large windows in the living room and bedrooms ensure natural light and a connection with the garden.
Dedicated balcony access for each bedroom, providing private outdoor space and adherence to Brutalist aesthetics.
